---
title: CSS and Styling
---

import { Code } from "@astrojs/starlight/components";

Fluid UI is built with [Tailwind](https://tailwindcss.com/), [shadcn/ui](https://ui.shadcn.com/) and [Radix](https://www.radix-ui.com/).

When working with components, you should follow the shadcn/ui [convention and CSS variables](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/theming#css-variables).

Each component inherits CSS variables from the [color scheme](/cms/color-schemes) of it's parent section.\
You can use the CSS variables as follow:

<Code
  lang="tsx"
  code={`<div className="bg-primary text-primary-foreground">Hello</div>`}
/>

<Code
  lang="css"
  code={`
/* Default background and foreground colors */
--background
--foreground
/* Muted colors such as <TabsList />, <Skeleton /> and <Switch /> */
--muted
--muted-foreground
/* Card colors */
--card
--card-foreground
/* Popover for popovers such as <DropdownMenu />, <HoverCard />, <Popover /> */
--popover
--popover-foreground
/* Default border color */
--border
/* Border color for inputs such as <Input />, <Select />, <Textarea /> */
--input
/* Primary colors for <Button /> */
--primary
--Primary-foreground
/* Secondary colors for <Button /> */
--secondary
--secondary-foreground
/* Used for accents such as hover effects on <DropdownMenuItem>, <SelectItem>...etc */
--accent
--accent-foreground
/* Used for destructive actions such as <Button variant="destructive"> */
--destructive
--destructive-foreground
/* Used for shadows */
--shadow
/* Used for focus ring */
--ring
`}
/>
